Package org.zurdavid.petrinets.model.reachabilitygraph

Class ReachabilityGraph

java.lang.Object
org.zurdavid.petrinets.model.reachabilitygraph.ReachabilityGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
IReachabilityGraph
public class ReachabilityGraph extends Object implements IReachabilityGraph
The class is an implementation of the interface IReachabilityGraph. It is the data model representation of a reachability graph. A reachability graph is implemented as a Map of markings and directed edges (see RGEdge leaving the marking.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor for a reachability graph containing only the initial marking.

    The method returns the outgoing edges of a passed in Marking.

    The method returns the current Petri net's initial marking.
